params.account: address of the token to get the storage roots from
params.blockHash: hash of the block from where the roots are generated
params.slot: hash of the explicit storage placement where the value to get is found.

returns._0: numeric slot value of the slot. The value must be decoded to get the actual stored information

params.account: address of the token to get the storage roots from
params.blockHash: hash of the block from where the roots are generated
params.slot: hash of the explicit storage placement where the value to get is found.
params.storageProof: generated proof containing the storage, at block hash

returns._0: an object containing the slot value at the specified storage slot

params.account: address of the token to get the storage roots from
params.blockHash: hash of the block from where the roots are generated

returns._0: state root hash of the account on the block hash specified

params.account: address of the token to get the storage roots from
params.accountStateProofRLP: rlp encoded account state proof, taken in same block as block hash
params.blockHash: hash of the block from where the roots are generated
params.blockHeaderRLP: rlp encoded block header. At same block where the block hash was taken

params.account: address of the token to get the storage roots from
params.blockHash: hash of the block from where the roots are generated
params.slot: hash of the explicit storage placement where the value to get is found.
params.storageProof: generated proof containing the storage, at block hash

getRegisteredSlot(bytes32,address,bytes3.notice: method to get the value from storage at a certain block hash, previously registered.

getStorage(address,bytes32,bytes32,bytes.notice: method to get the storage value at a certain slot and block hash for a certain address

getStorageRoots(address,bytes32).notice: method to get the storage roots of an account (token) in a certain block hash

processStorageRoot(address,bytes32,bytes.notice: method to process the storage root from an account on a block hash.

processStorageSlot(address,bytes32,bytes.notice: method to register the storage value at a certain slot and block hash for a certain address
